name: Which Ranger Is It? Online Quiz | TV for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which Ranger was not an original member of the Mighty Morphin team?
questions.explanation:
Tommy.

	Tommy Oliver (played by Jason David Frank) joined the team during an arc where he was first recruited to be an evil Ranger with the sixth power coin. After the evil spell was broken he joined the team as the Green Ranger.

Kimberly.

	Kimberly was a world class gymnast. When her character left the show in the third season it was written that she left to compete in international gymnastics competitions. Many scenes in the show had her doing gymnastics when she wasn't in uniform as a Ranger.

questions.text: Which Ranger built lots of gadgets and was generally the smartest of the group?
questions.explanation:
Billy.

	Billy was extremely smart. He built the teleporters used by the team, and their communicators. There was an entire episode based around him being upset that he earned a "B" on a paper at high school.

questions.text: Who joined the team as the White Ranger?
questions.explanation:
Tommy.

	Tommy, who had originally been the Green Ranger, lost his powers as part of a plot involving Rita Repulsa. After his powers were depleted, he left the team and wasn't in several episodes. When Zordon and Alpha 5 created the new White Ranger powers, Tommy rejoined the team with the new powers. He was the first Ranger to wear two different colored uniforms.

questions.text: Which Ranger used the Power Sword when morphed?
questions.explanation:
Jason.

	Jason, the Red Ranger, used the Power Sword. Each Ranger had a specialized weapon that they could call on during battle. They were used sporadically in the series' first three seasons.

questions.text: Which Ranger had a doll collection?
questions.explanation:
Trini.

	Trini's dolls weren't featured often, but there was a first season episode where Rita Repulsa turned Trini's favorite doll into one of her monsters. After defeating the monster version, the doll reverted back to a toy, unharmed.

questions.text: Which Ranger was missing a finger on his left hand?
questions.explanation:
Zack.

	The middle finger on his left hand was missing when he wasn't morphed, but mysteriously appeared when the Ranger was in costume. This was never even mentioned in the series, but the reason for the discrepancy is because the show used footage re-edited from Japanese TV for most of the fight scenes.

questions.text: Which Ranger piloted the Pterodactyl zord?
questions.explanation:
Kimberly.

	Kimberly, the Pink Ranger, drew her powers from the Pterodactyl and had the matching zord. Jason had the T-Rex, Trini the Saber-Toothed Tiger, Zack the Mastodon and Billy the Triceratops.

questions.text: Who was the only Ranger to last the entire three-season run of "Mighty Morphin Power Rangers"?
questions.explanation:
Billy.

	Jason, Trini and Zack all left at the same time. They were the first three Rangers to leave the show. Kimberly left about a year later and Billy stayed for the entire series. Tommy was in all three seasons, but didn't join the show until part way through the first season, and also left for a portion of season two.

questions.text: Who was the first team leader?
questions.explanation:
Jason.

	After Tommy joined the team, he slowly took over as the unofficial team leader and officially took the role when Jason left the team.
